name: Drastic Plastic
description:
Trembly-Wendy aspires to be like her idol Trendy-Wendy!

But beauty standards evolve faster than you, the master beauty surgeon, can give poor Wendy her makeover! How many Wendy’s can you trend, and will they be happy for long?

We created based on the concept of "beauty standards are out of control" and the game plays with the character customization feature and references how people follow trends that have trickled down from celebrities and idols. However, the goal and standard of that desire (in this world anyway) is so fast that even as the surgeon is changing Wendy's features, the world's beauty trends (and Wendy's opinion of what she wants) continue to change at a comparable speed to the surgery. 

As Trendy Wendy (the Trendiest Wendiest of them all) continues to break the internet with her new looks, new technologies increases the options avaliable to the player which the player must keep up with and remember where the pieces are to best serve the Wendy's before trends change again!

by Semone Bunnag + Teshome Samuel for the GMTK Game Jame 2020

Theme: Out of Control
